revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #15 Higog (Figy) |image = [[File:Figy.png]] |caption = Tiene una forma algo extraña, como si le faltara un pedazo. Su pulpa tiene notas picantes. |growtime = 5m 50s |harvest = 14 bayas |replant = 30% |mutation = 0.9% |points = 40 |flavor =
*15 picante *0 seco *0 dulce *0 amargo *0 ácido }} == Descripción == '''Higog (Figy)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela con al menos de 25 y no más de 80 puntos picantes y menos de 5 puntos de cualquier otro sabor. Se requiere haber desbloqueado la baya [[Cheri|Zreza (Cheri)]] para desbloquear esta baya. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 40 seg || 2 mins 40 seg || 3 mins 50 seg || 5 mins 50 seg - 11 mins 40 seg |- ! Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:FigyTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:FigyTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:FigyTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Tiempos de Maduración con modificadores === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificador !! Tiempo hasta la madurez-marchitado |- ! Ninguno | 5 min 50 seg -
11 min 40 seg |- ! Psydugadera | 3 min 53 seg -
7 min 47 seg |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Figy_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Figy berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Figy berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Hondew.png|20px]] [[Hondew]] || [[File:Wiki.png|20px]] [[Wiki]]
[[File:Aguav.png|20px]] [[Aguav]] |- | [[File:Grepa.png|20px]] [[Grepa]] || [[File:Aguav.png|20px]] [[Aguav]] |- | [[File:Occa.png|20px]] [[Occa]] || [[File:Razz.png|20px]] [[Razz]]
[[File:Tamato.png|20px]] [[Tamato]]
[[File:Spelon.png|20px]] [[Spelon]] |- | [[File:Rindo.png|20px]] [[Rindo]] || [[File:Aguav.png|20px]] [[Aguav]] |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Pokemon Mansion|Epic}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Magma Hideout|Common}} {{LootItem|Liberty Garden|Common}} |} |}

7 mins 47 secs |}
